slides.title: The Truth About Skincare
slides.content: Did you know your skin absorbs up to 60% of what you put on it? Let's explore why natural skincare matters.

slides.title: Key Benefits of Natural Skincare
slides.content:
1. No harsh chemicals
2. Environmentally friendly
3. Better long-term skin health
4. Rich in antioxidants
5. Gentle on sensitive skin

slides.title: Test Your Knowledge
slides.question: Which common skincare ingredient is linked to hormone disruption?

slides.title: Why It Matters
slides.content:
Natural skincare products:
✔️ Biodegrade safely
✔️ Support sustainable farming
✔️ Maintain skin's pH balance
✔️ Reduce chemical pollution

slides.title: Make the Switch!
slides.content:
Start with these natural alternatives:
• Coconut oil instead of silicone-based moisturizers
• Green tea extract instead of synthetic antioxidants
• Natural clays instead of microbead exfoliants
